• Home

Issue Tracker

Instructions:

  • Enter a project name to navigate to that project.
  • Once you are on the project page, you can create issues, mark them as closed, and delete them.

API

/issuetracker/api/:project

GET

Input: /issuetracker/api/my_project
Output: [{ "project": "my_project", "issue_title": "Issue One", "issue_text": "Main document needs formatting.", "created_on": 2019-10-09T16:16:27.617Z, "updated_on": 2019-10-09T16:16:27.617Z, "created_by": "Alex", "assigned_to": "Jim", "open": true, "status_text": "In Progress" }, { "project": "my_project", "issue_title": "Issue Two", "issue_text": "Need to complete routing", "created_on": 2019-10-09T16:16:27.617Z, "updated_on": 2019-10-09T16:16:27.617Z, "created_by": "Alex", "assigned_to": "Alex", "open": false, "status_text": "Completed" } ]

POST

Input: "project": "my_project", "issue_title": "Issue One", "issue_text": "Main document needs formatting.", "created_by": "Alex", "assigned_to": "Jim", "status_text": "In Progress"
Output: { "project": "my_project", "issue_title": "Issue One", "issue_text": "Main document needs formatting.", "created_on": 2019-10-09T16:16:27.617Z, "updated_on": 2019-10-09T16:16:27.617Z, "created_by": "Alex", "assigned_to": "Jim", "open": true, "status_text": "In Progress", "_id": 5d9e0fc7a616ec0c309205be }

PUT

marks an issue as closed
Input: "_id": "5d9e0fc7a616ec0c309205be"
Output: "successfully updated"

DELETE

Input: "_id": "5d9e0fc7a616ec0c309205be"
Output: "deleted 5d9e0fc7a616ec0c309205be"
